quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Old Lace
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, field, john. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who directed the 1944 film Arsenic and Old Lace, which is based on a play by Joseph Kesselring?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frank Capra

questions.question: Sally Field, Shirley MacLaine and Julia Roberts starred in the 1989 movie Fried Green Tomatoes.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: This character, portrayed by Grant Mitchell, is Elaines father in Arsenic and Old Lace.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Reverend Harper

questions.question: Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman and Shane Brolly star in the 2003 movie Underworld.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In Arsenic and Old Lace, John Alexanders character Teddy Brewster thinks he is who?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Theodore Roosevelt

questions.question: This movie about an alien visiting our planet starred Jeff Bridges, Karen Allen and Robert Phalen.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Starman

questions.question: Who portrays Elaine Harper Brewster in the 1944 movie Arsenic and Old Lace?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Priscilla Lane

questions.question: Which one of these movies starred George Clooney, Brad Pitt and Frances McDormand?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Burn After Reading

questions.question: Complete the name of Ron Whites first solo one-hour comedy special: They Call Me _____ _____.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tater Salad

questions.question: This movie starred Leonardo DiCaprio, Billy Zane and Kathy Bates.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Titanic

questions.question: Name the 2006 movie that starred these actors voices: Paul Newman, Owen Wilson and Bonnie Hunt.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cars

questions.question: Richard Gere, Terrence Howard and James Brolin starred in this 2007 movie about war crimes in Bosnia.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Hunting Party

questions.question: How many children does Ron White have from his first wife?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1

questions.question: This movie, which tells the story of a black private detective, was released in 1971 and starred Richard Roundtree, Moses Gunn and Christopher St. John.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shaft

questions.question: In the movie Arsenic and Old Lace, the whole story revolves around the evening of which celebration?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Halloween

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Old Lace and Mortimer
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, tune. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who portrays plastic surgeon Dr. Einstein in Arsenic and Old Lace?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter Lorre

questions.question: Who said the words There’s your gawd-damned dinner!! ?

options.text: Mel Brooks in To Be Or Not To Be

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nick Nolte in 48 Hours

questions.question: Mortimer, one of the main characters in Arsenic and Old Lace is trying to commit  his brother Teddy into which mental institution?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Happydale Sanitarium

questions.question: In Arsenic and Old Lace, what tune is Elaine whistling for Mortimer to come and get her?

options.text: Hi, Ho, Hi, Ho, its off to work we go

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Here Comes the Bride

questions.question: In the film Arsenic and Old Lace, Mortimer found out his aunts had been murdering gentlemen, who come to their house looking for a room to rent? How were they killing them?

options.text: By asking them to help with dinner and striking them with a rolling pin when they arent looking
By feeding them poisoned angel food cake
By asking them to check the furnace in the basement and then have Teddy push them down the steps
By giving them poisoned Elderberry wine

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: By giving them poisoned Elderberry wine

questions.question: Which character from Arsenic and Old Lace says the words: right out here in the open with everyone looking?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elaine

questions.question: Mortimer finds out towards the end of the movie Arsenic and Old Lace that he really isnt a Brewster.  Who is his father?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sea Cook

questions.question: Das Boot is a 1981 film which realistically depicts the harsh life on a what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fighter submarine

questions.question: At the end of the movie Arsenic and Old Lace the cab driver says he is what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a coffee pot

questions.question: Which actor said Youre a very funny guy, Solly. I like you. Thats why I’m going to kill you last.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arnold Schwartzenagger in Commando

questions.question: Which military conflict does the 1987 film Full Metal Jacket concern?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vietnam War

questions.question: In Arsenic and Old Lace, what is the name of the book Mortimer was working on?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mind over Matrimony

questions.question: How do the police describe Jonathan Brewster, a character in Arsenic and Old Lace?

options.text: Pop-eyes, talks with a German accent

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Looks like Karloff

questions.question: Which actor delivered the line All right. I’ll respect your traditions. Ill go to the headmaster and Ill lie!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brendon Frasier in School Ties

questions.question: Aunt Abby and Aunt Martha from Arsenic and Old Lace want Teddy to help them dispose of the dead bodies. What do they tell him about the gentleman they kill?

options.text: They were spies, so they had to silence them.
They were prisoners who tried to escape and were shot.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They were yellow fever victims.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Anchorman and Ron
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, fantana. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: News woman Veronica Corningstone from the movie Anchorman was played by actress Christina Applegate.  In what groundbreaking Fox TV sitcom did she make her starring debut?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Married...With Children

questions.question: After Ron hits rock bottom in the comedy hit Anchorman, he is seen walking the streets on a hot day with a full beard and carrying a beverage he regrets choosing.  What is he drinking?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Milk

questions.question: What couple gets married at the end of the movie Clueless?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Miss Geist and Mr. Hall

questions.question: In the film Clueless, what country was the Horowitzs maid Lucy from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: El Salvador

questions.question: Following the success of the movie Clueless, there was a series of books based on the movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the movie Anchorman, Brian Fantana attempts to hit on Veronica.  What special cologne does he apply for this occasion?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sex Panther

questions.question: Veteran actor Danny Trejo made a cameo appearance  as the bartender in Anchorman. Trejo owes much of his success as an actor to this Mexican Desperado director since Trejo has appeared in several of his films.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Rodriguez

questions.question: In the hit movie Anchorman, Veronica is introduced to the news team at a meeting in which diversity is discussed.  What does Ron Burgundy think diversity is?

options.text: An arsonist with oddly shaped feet
A wedding on top of a mountain

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: An old, old wooden ship

questions.question: In the comedy hit Anchorman, Ron Burgundy impressed Veronica Corningstone with his vast knowledge of the history of San Diego.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Why did Cher and Christian not get together in Clueless, even though Cher had a big crush on him?

options.text: He told Cher he thought she was shallow.
Chers dad did not want them to date.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was gay.

questions.question: The hit movie Anchorman was co-written and directed by this former Saturday Night Live writer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Adam McKay

questions.question: At the monthly pancake breakfast, Ron explains the meaning of love to the news team by singing the 70s hit Afternoon Delight in the smash comedy hit Anchorman.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the comedy movie Anchorman, Ron and the news team get lost in a back alley after taking Bricks shortcut to the suit store.  They are soon surrounded by rival news teams looking for a fight.  Which of the following actors does not play a rival news anchor in this scene?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Owen Wilson

questions.question: After getting Ron fired in the movie Anchorman, Veronica calls to check on him but cant bring herself to say anything.  Ron thinks it may be his lost dog, Baxter, and asks him to bark twice if he is in this U.S. city.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Milwaukee

questions.question: While out with Veronica, Ron is asked to perform for the crowd at Tinos Night Club.  What instrument does he play in the comedy movie Anchorman?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jazz Flute

questions.question: The family Kriticos unexpectedly inherits a house form their eccentric uncle Cyrus. When they arrive, they find that the house is entirely constructed from steel and glass. It doesnt take long before they are confronted with evil beings that dwell the place. The family discovers the house itself is one big riddle and in order to get away alive they need to find the key to solve it. What is the name of this horror movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 13 Ghosts
